author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-2U Inc Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.14
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - 2U Inc:
* 2U, INC. REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.14 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.01 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 51 PERCENT TO $86.7 MILLION * SEES Q1 REVENUE $91.1 MILLION - $91.6 MILLION
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $397.7 MILLION - $402.7 MILLION
* SEES Q1 NET LOSS PER SHARE $0.28 - $0.27
* SEES FY 2018 NET LOSS PER SHARE $0.84 - $0.80
* SEES Q1 ADJUSTED NET LOSS PER SHARE $0.14 - $0.13
* SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED NET LOSS PER SHARE $0.14 - $0.10
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.13, REVENUE VIEW $85.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.13, REVENUE VIEW $86.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.13, REVENUE VIEW $394.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
